What has been improved for the Outline?

The biggest change to the Outline is that it is now on the left of your screen! It is a lot easier to use alongside your content, Balloons and other sidebars. Furthermore, we made it easier for you to scan and navigate the Outline quickly.

Balloons are little cards attached to your page whenever there's a comment or change, side-by-side with the related content. They will help you stay focused on what's currently being edited without needing to glance back and forth.
What has been improved for Document History?
The Document History interface now aligns better with Fonto Editor and Fonto Review. While feeling more familiar, it has also become more powerful!

We've made substantial usability improvements. Comments and Changes will now be displayed in in-context Balloons. We've also made significant improvements to the Outline making it easier for you to quickly locate your content.
See more details of what has changed
See less details of what has changed
Fonto is responding correctly and we did not receive any system actions
